name: Asia Pacific Rail 2017
content: In 2017, Asia Pacific Rail will have more content than ever before, with 4 premium conference tracks, 3 seminar theatres and Underground/Overground University spanned across 2 days, covering the exciting innovations in rail freight, mainlines, high-speed rail, metros and more. Whilst the exhibition will feature over 80 exhibitors showcasing the latest technologies an innovations in signaling and communications, track infrastructure, rolling stock, automated ticketing system, asset management, condition monitoring, mainline, construction and more. Whether you’re a railway operator, railway authority or a solution provider to the global railway industry, you need to join us as we lay the foundations for Asia’s rail future.
